text: Pwadeglent awen tyimmatin nnwen, issit nnwen, tissetmatin nnwen, tiâamtiwin nnwen, tixaltitin nnwen, issit n ugmat, issit n tweltmap, tiyimmatin nnwen i kwen issuîîven, tissetmatin nnwen ukud teîîvem, tivegwalin nnwen, issit id tessekrem n tlawin nnwen ukud tcerkem usu - ma ur tecrikem ara usu, ulac u$ilif -, tilawin n warraw id turwem. Ur zdukulet snat tsetmatin, kkes ed ayen iâaddan, - Öebbi, s tidep, Izga Ipsemmiê, Ipêunu
